name: Think_
detailed_description:
Paul is a normal boy. He lives a normal life and is happy.
He has moved to a new city, and today is his first day in the new school.
No. Paul is no normal boy... A normal boy is not like that.
Help him. Please.


Think_ is an unconventional RPG with a rhythm-based combat system.
Listen to Paul's story from a different point of view - his own.

Features:
  • A rhythm-based combat system with arrows... for some reason.
  • Meta elements... idk why honestly.
  • Plenty of easter eggs.
  • Questionable design choices that you will totally dislike.
  • Uncool characters that you will unquestionably hate...

A final note: in this game nobody can die.
I mean.. that is possible... if you apply yourself to it.
But don't try to do it, bro.
Don't even think_ about it ok?

short_description: A normal rhythm-combat RPG in which everyone is NOT your friend.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: CPU with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

legal_notice:
The game "Think_" is not affiliated with Unity Technologies ApS apart from being made with the game engine "Unity".

Unity Technologies ApS is not affiliated in any way to the creator of the game.

"Think_" is a product from MaxPI and any usage of any content used in the game or in the game's files should be authorized by MaxPI or by a delegated person.
